title: What is Cholera
content:
Everybody in Tanzania should be aware that there is an outbreak of cholera, and that you, the population, are the most crucial actors in responding to it. Because only about a quarter of those infected with cholera show severe symptoms of cholera, three times as many people can be spreading the disease as the number of reported cases. 

Cholera is a bacterial disease that causes severe watery diarrhoea, caught from water and food contaminated with faeces.  It can kill quickly through dehydration but rapid re-hydration with ORS saves lives.
